channel.title: [317] Need help making a home teleport in spellbook + more [317]
channel.description:
I need help setting my home teleport in spellbook to Falador and i need help setting the spawn point for new players in Falador also please help.
Thanks, ElmosWorld

item.title: [317] Need help making a home teleport in spellbook + more [317]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“ElmosWorld, post:1, topic:386391”]I need help setting my home teleport in spellbook to Falador and i need help setting the spawn point for new players in Falador also please help.

Thanks, ElmosWorld[/quote]
Search the falador teleport spell in the place where you put. See:

xpos: ####
ypos: ####

is whatever it is after xpos and ypos, change it to:

xpos: 2964
ypos: 3378

And the ::home command would be:
Here
2nd post

And the place where the player first spawns initially + much more would be:
Here
It may take a while to find where the player first spawns initially.

Read full topic
